title: Pints to Cups Converter (US liquid, US dry, Imperial)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: US liquid: cups = pints × 2 US dry: cups = pints × 2.3273 (approx.) Imperial: cups = pints × 2
